data.title: Outside shade seating pet friendly
data.text: Wonderful place for pizza and a beer.  Sitting outside under their shade canopy is great and pet friendly.  Fabulous pizza regularly.

data.title: Excellent pizza and family place.
data.text: Let's be upfront and honest right off the start.  This is not some cookie cutter pizza place.  Plan to pay a little more and wait a little longer but the results are so worth it.  This is one of my kids favorite places to go and the pizza never lets us down nor does the excellent and even eccentric gelato flavors.  Give it a try and you won't be disappointed.

data.title: Delicious Pizza!
data.text: A friend brought me to Sam and Greg's for lunch and the pizza was delicious.  Not extremely expensive.  Service was a tad slow, but worth it for the quality of the pizza.

data.title: Quick, late lunch
data.text: Stopped in for a bite after some downtown shopping.  My wrap was huge so I took some home to enjoy the next day.  Great craft beer on tap.  We topped our lunch off with fantastic gelato to enjoy as we enjoyed a beautiful afternoon.

data.title: Gelato AND pizza!
data.text: Fresh ingredients and a quality crust. Great gelato options: coconut, Nutella, Mexican chocolate, and fresh strawberry are my favorites!

data.title: Love Sam & Gregg's
data.text: Met family there before football ballgame Friday evening.  Ordered via phone for dine in.  Everything was as ordered and ready upon arrival.  Both pizza and sandwiches were custom orders, and were delicious.  They have best gelato in town IMO.

data.title: Quick Stop
data.text: Quick stop for pizza on long trip... great pizza, service and atmosphere.. no issues with anything and would recommend for anyone looking for a beer and some good food....

data.title: Was There Just for the Gelato
data.text: We were there on a rainy Saturday night for the gelato. Seems to be very popular, crowded. We were in a separate line for the gelato and were not seated. Gelato was good. I had strawberry and my son had coffee-flavored which was very tasty. Will return for more when in town again.

data.title: Great for Locals and Tourists
data.text: A unique place to eat when you don't want the chain type restaurants; laid back and relaxing with good food; a little pricey but worth it; great food and good selection for all, even those lactose intolerant and gluten issues;  can sit inside our outside; nice for an evening date to sit outside and enjoy the downtown area, especially when there is an event going on around the square

data.title: Cute Local Place
data.text: My first visit: The pizzas and stromboli were good, gelato was very good, but don't expect super-gourmet. They offer whole wheat flour and gluten free crust options, & they offered 2 dairy-free sorbets along with the gelatos that day- good for the lactose intolerant! They also offered a good selection of local beers on tap. Refreshing little local place where everything was fresh and healthier! Once your food is delivered if you need anything you do have to go to the bar and ask for assistance, and you refilled your own drinks, but that's not a big deal to us. Prices are a little high, but good quality food isn't cheap to make!

data.title: Great pizza and venue
data.text: Was referred here by our hotel as a place kid friendly. After being on the road this was a great choice. Pizza was delicious. We ordered a cheese and a Polynesian and split a steak and cheese with the family. Service was great. Too hot for us northerners to eat outside. Outdoor patio was great.

data.title: Madison Location ... Nice Place but where is the service!
data.text: I'm reviewing the Madison location as I have never been to the original Huntsville location. The building is awesome and the location is great. The pizza is decent, tasty, nice sauce and toppings. They have a nice selection of craft beers. The ordering process is awkward, you get in line and place your drink and food order next to the bar. You get a vibrating box, your drinks, plates, silverware that you have to carry to your table. Once at the table you wait for your box to vibrate...often it doesn't and someone finally brings your pizza to the table BUT don't ever put the vibrating box on the can in the middle of the table because they will let you know that's wrong. We would buy more beer IF someone would come around to take the order and bring it to the table...but getting back in line to get more drinks is painful when they are busy...so we don't. I really think they would sell twice as much beer if they waited tables. Overall, decent place but I personally don't care for the ordering process. Based on my rating, I would give it a 5 out of 10.

data.title: Just average
data.text: The pizza was ok, and the gelato was disappointing. Why aren't there any good homemade ice cream places around here? The location is lovely.

data.title: Great pizza, comfortable atmosphere
data.text: One of our go-to places if we are downtown. We are pretty picky about pizza but this place is good!! And it is very affordable for a family to eat there. We have had some informal birthday parties there and at the Madison location and they are ways super nice and accomodating.

data.title: Pizza and gelato
data.text: Absolutely love this pizzeria. Very busy on the weekends so be prepared to wait. Fabulous pizzas that are incredibly varied and unusual.  The gelato options are also  creative and wonderful. Seating outside and in. They could use an extra register during busy times. Located on the square and super eclectic and fun.

data.title: Just had Gelato...
data.text:
The Gelato was so so.  Honestly wasn't that great.  It was nice that is all natural and made daily.  Do not think we will be going back to have their Gelato...

But, their pizza did look pretty good.  Will update after we try that!

data.title: Good pizza
data.text: Slightly expensive for pizza but overall pretty good. The pizza was tasty and the ambiance was fun. Didn't get a chance to taste the ice cream.

data.title: Perfect Summer Spot
data.text: Not only great pizza, but the best gelato around. With new and exciting flavors weekly, Sam and Gregs keep customers wanting more. They even have drunken milkshakes that are the bomb-dot-com!

data.title: Look no further for the perfect gelato! Trying the pizza soon!
data.text: We stumbled upon his place when I searched "ice cream and gelato" on Google and we did not realize they also offered many other Italian specialties. We had already had dinner at another restaurant and we decided to give this place a try and it was within walking distance to the big parking garage we used. What a find! The gelato is extraordinary here! The coffee gelato specifically- is perfection! It has an assertive and distinctive coffee flavor without being overwhelmed with sweetness or too much bland milk flavor. It is spot on perfect for a coffee confection and I thoroughly enjoyed it. Hubby had the chocolate and it was equally delicious. Cannot wait to try this wonderful place again!

data.title: Best Gelato in town!
data.text:
Visited Sam & Greg's for the first time, and it was delicious! The place itself is really small, but the quality is simply so good! The prices are decent as well. 
The employees didn't seem to know what Year they won the certificate of excellent, so maybe a little bit of training on that! It was 2015 FYI! And I certainly see why! Next time I'm in town, I'll be there!!
